altername_name: Senkai Taisen - TV Animation Senkaiden Houshin Engi yori
name: Senkai Taisen: TV Animation Senkaiden Fuukami Engiyori
overview: Senkai Taisen: TV Animation Senkaiden Fuukami Engiyori is a Role-Playing game, developed by Opera House and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000
